divs: sighting detailsi was driving home and i just happened to look out the window and i saw a rocket\missile shaped object with a blue light attached to the back of it falling from the sky about 200 yards away from me in a nearby field. my first reaction was that it couldn't have been a blimp, as it was going too fast to be that. my friend and i both saw it, he started having an anxiety attack and called the local police about it. i lost sight of the ufo once it left the horizon line on land. it seemed to be crash landing though.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Belleville
There were no other sightings in Belleville on or around January 28th 2009
Summary: Blueish green flashing light coming from it. Looked like it was crash landing.
